channel.title: News - Polish Domestic Policy
channel.description: News articles related to Polish Domestic Policy

item.title: Remembering the 1970 December Revolt
item.description: A new project aims to establish a National Day of Remembrance for the 1970 December Revolt in Poland.

item.title: Expert Criticizes Polish Justice System Appointment
item.description: Prof. Antoni Dudek criticizes President Andrzej Duda's nomination of Bogdan Święczkowski as president of the Constitutional Tribunal, warning about its potential impact on the country.

item.title: Senior Voucher Payment Date Announced
item.description: The Civic Coalition has introduced a seniors' voucher to support elderly care services, with payment details recently disclosed.

item.title: Morawiecki Calls for European Revitalization
item.description: Polish Prime Minister Mateusz Morawiecki emphasizes the need to revitalize Europe.

item.title: Morawiecki Calls for European Revitalization
item.description: Polish Prime Minister Morawiecki urges for the rejuvenation and strengthening of Europe.
